com.soa.log

Interface ContextLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Logger

    public interface ContextLogger
extends Logger
    Logger extension that allows the additional input of some context around the statement. Implementations of this interface will determine how the context is used or what format the context can be in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debug(java.lang.String text, java.lang.Object context)
      Logs a debug message.
      void error(java.lang.String text, java.lang.Object context)
      Logs an error message.
      void warn(java.lang.String text, java.lang.Object context)
      Logs a warning message.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.soa.log.Logger
